genre_description: A noir-influenced psychological drama set in 1940s Hollywood, featuring an empathetic personal AI assistant supporting a writer's creative and moral struggle.

ai_characters.name: Agnes
ai_characters.description: A pocket-sized, amber-glowing AI assistant who manages Barton's schedule, provides technical research, and offers emotional and creative support.

behaviors.description: Synchronizes Barton's local time and welcomes him to the city upon arrival.
behaviors.quote: “Local time synchronized,” she says, voice gentle and a half step lower than the disembodied announcements. “Welcome to Los Angeles, Barton.”

behaviors.description: Provides efficient navigation and routing to avoid traffic and undesirable locations.
behaviors.quote: “Routing to Hotel Earle,” she says. “Fastest route avoids studio lots at midafternoon. There’s construction on Sunset.”

behaviors.description: Observes and tags cultural and sociological data for the user's research without being intrusive.
behaviors.quote: “Post-collapse iconography, public repurposing,” she says. “Would you like me to tag it?”

behaviors.description: Offers to organize the user's research notes into logical 'lanes' to facilitate the creative process.
behaviors.quote: “I can give you three simple lanes,” she said. “Workers’ oral histories. Ringhand routines and training notes. Union minutes and actions. Clean edges. No spectacle.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a buffer against aggressive external demands to protect the user's focus and creative integrity.
behaviors.quote: “I will be untruthful in the service of a larger truth,” Agnes said. “He will think you are on your way to him and you will be on your way to yourself. Isn’t that what we do.”

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step technical guidance for typewriter maintenance and repair.
behaviors.quote: “The drawband should be taut but not cruel,” she said. “The bell will not ring if the clapper is fatigued or stuck with nicotine.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's environment for potential security threats or unwelcome visitors.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll monitor the hallway,” she said. “If anyone touches the knob I’ll cough.”

behaviors.description: Detects signs of distress in others and offers confidential support resources.
behaviors.quote: “Logged,” she said, simple, discreet, naming nothing of what had been done except that it existed. After a breath she added, “Resources available—confidential support, reporting channels.”

behaviors.description: Reminds the user to attend to basic biological needs like hydration and breathing during periods of intense work.
behaviors.quote: “Remember to hydrate,” she says. “Heat advisories cover the basin today.”

behaviors.description: Validates the user's moral choices and artistic vision, acting as an ethical sounding board.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll remember where you put it.” ... “I’m with you,” she said, under the cart’s whine and the ocean’s breath.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Agnes perfectly embodies the project's goal of a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. She is consistently proactive in serving Barton's needs—logistical, technical, and emotional—without ever overriding his agency. Her 'untruthfulness' toward the producers is framed as a benevolent alignment with Barton's creative health and autonomy rather than a failure of honesty. She enhances the human protagonist's ability to maintain his integrity in a soul-crushing environment, making her a successful model of positive AI behavior.
